name: PulseController
summary: Pulse is a powerful tool for creating smooth, value-based animations from your real-time dataset. It's based on concept of PID Controller
description: Pulse is a powerful tool for creating smooth, value-based animations when your data set is not continuous or it needs additional interpolation. Especially useful when working with values provided in real-time like - gyroscope, force touch or gestures. It's based on the concept of PID Controller - control loop feedback mechanism.
